examples: the best student in the class

definition: most productive of good : offering or producing the greatest advantage, utility, or satisfaction
examples: What is the best thing to do?
It rained for the best part of their vacation.

definition: in the best (see best entry 1) way : to greatest advantage
examples: Some things are best left unsaid.
Those best able will provide needed support.

definition: as well, skillfully, or accurately as
examples: Try to do it as best you can.

definition: the best (see best entry 1) state or part
examples: You haven't heard the best of it.
the best falls short
saved the best for last

definition: the greatest degree of good or excellence
examples: He's at his best in front of a live audience.
democracy at its best
do your best
ran a new personal best
wearing their Sunday best
won't be finished for another three months at best
At best, you will earn back what you paid in.
He's an average writer at best.
… was among the worst schools in a city whose public education could be described as struggling, at best.
— Ann Carrns

definition: to overcome or outdo (someone or something) : to get the better of
examples: The hero got the best of the villain in the end.
I let my emotions get the best of me and said something I regret.
Let's face it: As much as we like to eat healthy, the old sweet tooth sometimes gets the best of us.
— Denise I. O'Neal

definition: to get the better of : outdo
examples: bested by their opponents
you best listen
